snippet.title: IZGUB 2001 Official Teaser Trailer (2024)
snippet.description:
The country of Izgub is stuck in an unending civil war between Reds and Yellows ever since its defeat to a Semigradian invasion. You are Luka Inostrantsev, a civilian that happened to be in the sunny Free City of Jasnovo at the wrong time. Navigate intricate plots in the political and criminal landscape of Izgub and achieve the ending you consider right.
The game is a visual novel with multiple available endings and hours of gameplay.

Add IZGUB 2001 to your wishlist:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3071120/IZGUB_2001/
Follow IZGUB 2001 on: 
Telegram: https://t.me/IZGUB2001
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/izgub_2001/
VK: https://vk.com/izgub2001
Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/IZGUB2001
